name: LightEmUp Static RGB Light Rifle Kits
description: Add an eye-popping effect to your Marching Band or Winterguard Show with the help of the LightEmUp Static RGB Rifle Kit. This kit allows for the addition of super bright LED lights on the 36" or 39" Director's Showcase rifle that you already own, with seven color options to choose from (Red, Pink, Blue, Aqua, Green, Yellow, and White). LightEmUp Static RGB Rifle Demo on Youtube Simply unscrew the bolt, cut out holes for the switch and color selector, tape down your new lights and you're ready to add stunning effects to your production! These kits are tested with Director's Showcase International Rifles (Leather Straps). We cannot absolutely guarantee that these kits will fit on other makes/models of equipment, though they just might. Requires 36" or 39" Rifle (Directors Showcase Elite Series with Leather Strap Recommended. If unsure, if you can place a 9v laying flat under the bolt while its screwed in, you should be good), cutting tool (please use caution with sharp objects), and two 9 Volt Batteries. * * * Shipping Note * * * This item is custom built, and they will ship as they become available. Shipping updates can be found on LightEmUpBand.com, as well as on our Twitter and Facebook Pages.

name: LightEmUp Static Horn Light Kit
description: LightEmUp Static Color Horn Lights Performer Controlled Horn Lights for Trumpets, Mellophones, Baritones and Euphoniums Show off the power of your Brass with Glowing Bells! Choose from Red, Green, Blue, Yellow or White Great for Features or Effects Comes with: 1x LED Horn Light Panel with Switch Requires 1x 9 Volt Battery (not included)

name: LightEmUp Static RGB Sousaphone Light Kit - SD
description: Add eye-popping effects to your Marching Band Show or Pep Band with the help of the LightEmUp Static RGB Sousa Light Kit. This kit allows for the addition of super bright LED lights onto virtually any Sousaphone, with seven color options to choose from (Red, Pink, Blue, Aqua, Green, Yellow, and White), as well as a special "safety" setting, to prevent accidental activation during travel and storage! Contrary to popular belief, this kit DOES NOT interfere with the quality of sound like other setups do! Have the visual pop, without losing any of that low brass power! This kit also places the ON-OFF switch near the performer's hand, allowing for easy activation! To install, simply secure the included LED Light Strip inside the bell of the Sousaphone with tape (Recommended) or with the attached 3M Adhesive, secure the battery pack, click in the switch and you're illuminating the field! These kits are tested with Yamaha and King Sousaphones. We cannot absolutely guarantee that these kits will fit on other makes/models of equipment, though they just might. Requires electrical or masking tape, zip ties, and 8 AAA Batteries (Not Included). * * * Shipping Note * * * This item is custom built, and they will ship as they become available. Shipping updates can be found on LightEmUpBand.com, as well as on our Twitter and Facebook Pages.

name: LightEmUp Static RGB Light Kit - Drumline Kits
description: LightEmUp Static RGB Units with LED Strips 13" & 14" Snares Tenors 16"-30" Bass Drums Performer Controlled Switch 7 Static Color Options (Red, Pink, Blue, Aqua, Green, Yellow, White) Below, there are three linked Vine videos of our Static RGB Kits for Snares, Tenors, and Basses. Do note that our bass video is missing a segment of LED strip, but you get the gist of what we're up to! We also have these kits in high-density versions, meaning that there are twice the number of individual LEDs per strip, essentially meaning twice the brightness! Just contact us for pricing! https://vine.co/v/hZBAEIJ6qdV - LightEmUp Snare Vine https://vine.co/v/hZBiYUIQn2H - LightEmUp Tenor Vine https://vine.co/v/hZBOduVQHrB - LightEmUp Bass Vine We now offer Budget Snare light kits with one top LED strip, or the original with two LED strips for top and bottom! Comes with: 1x LightEmUp Static RGB Pack w/ Switch LED Strip(s) cut to length (1 or 2 for Snares, 2 for both sides of Basses, 1 for Tenors) 1x AA or AAA (8x) Battery Pack (Batteries not included)
